events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit at all and I would like to request a refund for the item as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a Refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting their money back.
An agent specialized in handling refund requests has been assigned to this case to assist the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item is unused and in its original packaging?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new and still in the original packaging since I haven't worn it.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. I will send you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds perfect, thank you for helping me with this so quickly. I appreciate the prepaid label for the return.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund to your original payment method. You should see the amount in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support!
